page.title: 09Council Housing
page.content: These houses are situated in Hall Green, Painthorpe and a part of Crigglestone. Large sites are in the Jubilee St.Marshall Ave and Copeworth Drive areas. Grenville walk near copeworth drive is where bungalows are occupied by retired people. The houses are either semi_detached or terraced, constructed of red brick rendred.{ {Owner Occupied}the houses or bungalows in Hollingthorpe estate are all privately owned.The buildings are constructed of red brick with wood facing.The roofs are all tiled.Some houses have patio doors but mainly original simple windows.{Old Houses} There are many old houses in Stoney Lane and Chapelthorpe areas.The houses are all made of Yorkshire stone blocks.The houses are all made of Yorkshire stone blocks.The roofs are covered by large slates.
